name: Hydromagnetic Cannon
customPrimary: Each impact against exposed armor or hull has a chance to degrade the target's %s by %s. Loss of armor at the site of impact increases odds of applying penalty.

name: Spatial Charge Launcher
customPrimary: Not affected by missile speed, acceleration, and flight time modifiers.

name: Breach SRM (High Delay)
customPrimary: Each missile deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.

name: Breach SRM (Single)
customPrimary: Each missile deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.

name: LR Burst Laser (Gunship)
customPrimary: Laser ablation removes %s extra armor on each hit against an unshielded hull. This effect is not reduced by armor.

name: Atropos MIRV Launcher
tags: missile18, strike15, rare_bp, hist1t, merc, ind
customPrimary: Deploys %s guided Atropos torpedoes near the target. First stage unguided booster rocket extends the total range of the weapon to approximately %s.

name: Deadeye Plasma Seeker
customPrimary: Fires %s. Unlike most energy weapons, the charged projectiles can be intercepted by point defenses.

name: Ion Streamer
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor periodically arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Siege Burst Laser
customPrimary: Laser ablation removes %s extra armor on each hit against an unshielded hull. This effect is not reduced by armor.

name: Tactical Burst Laser
customPrimary: Laser ablation removes %s extra armor on each hit against an unshielded hull. This effect is not reduced by armor.

name: #Kinetic Blaster
customPrimary: Deals %s of base weapon damage as extra damage against shields. This extra damage is not affected by skills.
